levels.description: When triggered, <$ba.sluggish>Slows</> all surrounding targets and reduces the hit rate of Physical and Arts attacks by <@ba.vup>{damage_hitrate_physical:0%}</>, lasting for <@ba.vup>{sluggish}</>s
